name: Frank: CAT-cher of Mice
description:
Submitted for the Low Effort Jam 4

Make sure to put it into full screen or else parts of the screen will be cut off!

In this game you play as Frank the cat and your job is to catch mice which have infested your master's house. Your master has put cheese on the floor to lure the mice, so you can catch them. But, if a mouse escapes back into its hole, your master will get REALLY angry. If he gets too angry, its game over for Frank.

This is an arcade game so the point is to last as long as possible and get as many points as possible. So be sure to comment your high score!

Controls:

Use the Arrow keys to move...

that's it. No, seriously.
